## Component Overview

Production-ready React/TypeScript component for Step 2 of the Child Profile Setup Wizard.

### File Location
```
src/components/onboarding/Step2_CoreValues.tsx
```

### Purpose
Allows parents to select exactly 2 core values from 25 German values that will guide story generation.

---

## Key Features

‚úÖ **Responsive Grid:** 2 cols (mobile) ‚Üí 3 cols (tablet) ‚Üí 5 cols (desktop)  
‚úÖ **Exact Selection:** Must select exactly 2 values, no more/less  
‚úÖ **Visual Feedback:** Selected cards highlight with purple accent + checkmark  
‚úÖ **Disabled State:** Unselected cards dimmed when 2 are chosen  
‚úÖ **Framer Motion Animations:** Smooth stagger animations & interactions  
‚úÖ **Dark Mode Support:** Responds to system theme  
‚úÖ **Accessibility:** ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, WCAG AA compliant  
‚úÖ **Error Handling:** Toast notification if trying to select 3rd value

## Usage Example

```tsx
import { Step2_CoreValues } from '@/components/onboarding/Step2_CoreValues';

function OnboardingFlow() {
  const [childProfile, setChildProfile] = useState({
    name: 'Emma',
    age: 7,
    coreValues: []
  });

  const handleCoreValuesNext = (selectedValues: string[]) => {
    setChildProfile(prev => ({ ...prev, coreValues: selectedValues }));
    // Navigate to Step 3
  };

  return (
    <Step2_CoreValues
      childName={childProfile.name}
      initialValues={childProfile.coreValues}
      onNext={handleCoreValuesNext}
      onBack={() => console.log('Go to Step 1')}
    />
  );
}
```
